column4: everytime i log into gnome i need to killall pulseaudio for my sound to work. and i also need to killall gnome-screensaver or else it makes full screen video act really slow
how i can i make it so pulseaudio and gnome-screensaver dont start?
i think it would be better to fix.. but you find them in the session system>prefs>sessions
that doesnt seem to disable them
